FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about our plans

As an MVNO (Mobile Virtual Network Operator), we lease network capacity from AT&T at wholesale rates. We don't have expensive retail stores or massive marketing budgets, so we pass those savings directly to you.

Yes! Our unlimited plans are truly unlimited - no data caps and no overage charges. Some plans may have reduced speeds during network congestion after using a certain amount of high-speed data, but you'll never be cut off.

There's no catch! You get the same AT&T network, same coverage, same 5G access. The only difference is we operate more efficiently and charge less. No hidden fees, no contracts, no surprises.

Not at all. You're using AT&T's same towers and infrastructure. Your calls, texts, and data work identically to AT&T's own customers. The savings come from our business model, not from reduced service quality.

Zero hidden fees. Your monthly price includes all taxes and regulatory fees. The price you see on our website is exactly what you pay - that's our promise.

Yes! Our Budget Unlimited plan at $15/month includes unlimited talk, text, and data. You get 10GB of high-speed data, and unlimited data at reduced speeds after that. It's perfect for moderate data users.
